name: oscerd-tomcat
description:
The Tomcat module installs and customize Apache Tomcat on your node.
The module make possible to set the Tomcat version, the directory into which
it will install, the temporary folder where the package will be extracted and many other features. Take a look at the documentation to know more.
author: Oscerd
summary: The Tomcat module installs and customize Apache Tomcat on your nodes.
